alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wallace, southwestern Thomas, northwestern Logan and southeastern Sherman Counties through 945 PM MDT/1045 PM CDT/... At 915 PM MDT/1015 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Winona, or 18 miles northeast of Sharon Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wallace, southwestern Thomas, northwestern Logan and southeastern Sherman Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT/100 AM CDT/ for northwestern and west central Kansas.
